description: Manage users, groups, and access controls in CyberArk Privileged Access Management

actions.name: activate_user
actions.description: Activates an existing user who was suspended after entering incorrect credentials multiple times

actions.name: add_member_to_group
actions.description: Adds a user as a member to an existing Vault group (requires Add/Update users permissions)

actions.name: change_credentials_bulk
actions.description: Marks multiple accounts for an immediate credentials change by the CPM to a new random value

actions.name: change_credentials_in_vault_bulk
actions.display_name: Change Credentials in the Vault in Bulk
actions.description: Sets credentials for multiple accounts and changes them in the Vault. This does not affect credentials on the target device.

actions.name: change_credentials_in_vault
actions.description: Sets account credentials and changes them in the Vault. This will not affect credentials on the target device.

actions.name: create_user
actions.description: Creates a new user in the CyberArk Vault

actions.name: delete_user
actions.description: Deletes a specific user in the Vault (requires Add/Update Users authorization)

actions.name: disable_user
actions.description: Disables a specific user in the Vault

actions.name: enable_user
actions.description: Enables a specific user in the Vault

actions.name: find_user
actions.description: Returns a list of existing users in the Vault based on filter criteria (requires Audit users permissions)

actions.name: get_password_value
actions.description: Retrieves the password or SSH key of an existing account identified by its Account ID

actions.name: reconcile_credentials_bulk
actions.description: Marks multiple accounts for automatic reconciliation by the CPM

actions.name: remove_member_from_group
actions.description: Removes a specific user from a user group in the Vault

actions.name: retrieve_private_ssh_key
actions.description: Retrieves a private SSH key file from an existing account identified by its Account ID

actions.name: update_user
actions.description: Updates an existing Vault user (except Master and Batch built-in users)

actions.name: verify_credentials_bulk
actions.description: Marks multiple accounts for verification by the CPM
